text: Skittles may refer to: * Skittles (confectionery), a brand of fruit-flavor chewy candy, distributed by Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company *Skittles Commercial: The Broadway Musical * Skittles (sport), the game from which bowling originated * Skittles (chess), a casual chess game in chess jargon * Skittles, a carrom version that uses a spinning top to knock over pins * Skittles, a slang term for Coricidin in recreational uses * "Skittles", nickname of Catherine Walters, a famous Victorian courtesan
title: Skittles
